name: K2A
description: Control rate to audio rate converter. Converts a control rate signal to audio rate.

name: A2K
description: Audio rate to control rate converter. Decimates audio rate signal to control rate.

name: DC
description: DC offset generator. Generates a constant signal at audio or control rate.

name: T2A
description: Trigger to audio rate converter. Converts control rate triggers to audio rate impulses.

inputs.name: in
inputs.description: Control or audio rate trigger input

inputs.name: offset
inputs.description: Sample offset within the control period

name: T2K
description: Trigger to control rate converter. Converts audio rate triggers to control rate.

name: Silence
description: Silent audio bus. Outputs silence on a specified number of channels.

inputs.name: numChannels
inputs.description: Number of channels of silence to generate
